response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your business. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
